caption:
“Faith is the weapon that never dulls.”

Reflection:
Doubt may strike, but faith endures sharp and shining. Every prayer hones its edge.

Commentary:
This line turns faith into armor and blade — resilience forged in trust. No darkness can blunt the edge of belief.
